data.name: Spell Sweeper
data.detailed_description:
Spell Sweeper is a puzzle game which based on "Minesweeper".
You get summon by "Square" country and fight against "Sphere" country as a Hero.
Your goal is to defeat the BOSS!

How To Fight?

Fighting is so simple.

1: Open squares and Place flags on spells.
2: Then start attack!
When you open enemy spell, you just lose your "PP"!
　No need to worry about mistake!

Skill and PP

In this game there are "Skill" and "PP(Pride Point)"

* By using "Skill", you can see inside of unopen square.
* Hero has a "PP" and if you lose too much "PP", you will die.
　 So Be Careful!

Get EXP! And Level Up!

You will get "EXP" after win each battle.

And each time level up, you get +1 PP!

Get strong and try defeat the BOSS!

data.short_description: Spell Sweeper is a puzzle game which based on "Minesweeper". Fight against enemy by Opening/placing flags to squares.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) m3-7Y30 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Run on 30 FPS at Very low settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
